review_title: All-Over Face Color in Glee is a NO GO!
review_content:
I purchased the BareMinerals All Over Face Color in Glee expecting the same experience with this makeup that I have had in the past. The previous product was a very sheer, pinky, slightly brown color that I could sweep on pretty much anywhere on my face to highlight it. They still advertise it as having radiance and providing a dewy, gorgeous glow. Well, I just received it and there is no longer has any sparkle to it, not in the least. Maybe there was a formulary problem with this batch but I will be returning it promptly. There is nothing sheer about this, I look as if someone slapped me across the face! Not exactly the look I'm trying to achieve... Stay away unless you want a dense, opaque color to work with. Also, the color is no longer a pinky, brown. It is a deep orange/pink. HORRIBLE!

review_content: This is the only bronzer you need. It can be added to other mineral powder to make it darker in the summer. I love to use it as bronzer and to contour. I've used this product for over 12 years!

user_specs: ['Age over 54', 'Skin Type Combination', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Eye Color Blue']
review_content: I have been using this product for over 10 years. I really like the coverage of all of the Bare Mineral's products.

I self tan and this blends my face with my tan neck/body so well! As someone with (fading) acne scars, however, this can accentuate them. Also I noticed that when applying by itself it acts as a nice, natural looking color but it can look a bit "muddy" when applied over foundation. The product itself lasts pretty well without a primer, and I have oily skin which usually causes product to slide off. So far I love it, I just need to be careful around scars!
